entries.serenity_d: A hostile use of the Force has lessened your will for combat, weakening your Health, Action, and Mind attributes.
entries.suffering_d: A malicious use of the Force has caused pain to course through your body, weakening your Health, Action, and Mind attributes.
entries.inventory_full_jedi_robe: You have too many items in your inventory.  In order to get your Padawan Robe you must clear out at least one free slot.
entries.fs_progress_5: You feel an inner glow.  The Force is with you.
entries.fs_progress_4: You feel a strong sense of the Force within you.
entries.fs_progress_3: You feel a surge of the Force within you.
entries.fs_progress_2: You feel a faint sense of the Force.
entries.fs_progress_1: You barely sense something different about yourself.
entries.fs_progress_0: You feel no connection with the Force.
entries.holocron_force_replenish: The holocrom hums softly as you feel your Force power replenish.
entries.holocron_force_max: You are already at your maximum Force power.
entries.holocron_no_effect: The holocron hums briefly, but otherwise does nothing.
entries.already_in_meditative_state: You are already in a meditative state
entries.cant_revoke_prompt: Revoking this skill will make you ineligible for the Force Ranks.  You cannot revoke the skill until you have removed yourself from the Force Ranks.
entries.confirm_revoke_prompt:
Revoking this skill will remove you completely from the Force Rank System.  You will need to redo the Jedi Knight Trials to re-enter.

Are you certain you want to revoke this skill?
entries.power_already_active: This target is already affected by that power.
entries.cant_train_while_converting: I can't speak to you right now.  Come back when you're done with whatever it is that you're doing.
entries.revoke_force_title: You cannot revoke a Force progression skill.
entries.not_while_in_combat: You cannot perform that action while in combat.
entries.force_absorb_hit: You gain %DI Force power from your enemies attack.
entries.revoke_force_progression: You cannot revoke a Force progression skill.
entries.revoke_force_sensitive: You cannot revoke this Force sensitive skill.  Doing so would take you under the Jedi requirement of six complete skill branches.
entries.saber_convert_complete: You have successfully dismantled your lightsaber and recovered some of its parts.
entries.saber_convert_full: There is not enough room in your inventory to dismantle this lightsaber.
entries.saber_convert_sliced: This saber was altered by a Smuggler and some parts were damaged.
entries.saber_cant_convert: You cannot dismantle this saber to recover any parts.
entries.remove_forceprotection: Your solid barrier of Force fades.
entries.apply_forceprotection: A solid barrier of the Force forms around you.
entries.force_protection_d: You are encased in a semi-solid barrier of the Force that protects you from normal and Force attacks.
entries.apply_forcerun3: The force flows through your veins and you begin to run faster.
entries.apply_forcerun2: The force flows through your veins and you begin to run faster.
entries.apply_forcerun1: The force flows through your veins and you begin to run faster.
entries.force_run_d: Your running speed is accelerated by the Force.
entries.crystal_tune_success: You have successfully tuned the crystal.
entries.saber_already_has_color: You already have a blade color-modifying Force crystal in this lightsaber.
entries.saber_crystal_not_owner: That crystal has been tuned to a different Jedi, it will not work in your lightsaber.
entries.saber_crystal_not_tuned: That crystal has not been tuned to you.  You will need to tune it before inserting it into your lightsaber.
entries.saber_not_while_equpped: You cannot modify the crystals in this lightsaber while it is equipped.
entries.saber_not_crystal: That is not compatible with your lightsaber.  Only valid Force crystals can be used in this lightsaber.
entries.not_with_armor: You cannot use Force powers or lightsaber abilities while wearing armor.
entries.must_be_higher_rank: You must have the skill %TO to wear this robe.
entries.target_no_force: That target does not have any Force power.
entries.channel_ham_too_low: Your body is too weakened to perform that action.
entries.avoid_incapacitation_d: Your use of the Force is preventing your body from succumbing to its wounds.
entries.remove_avoidincapacitation: Your body is no longer sustained by the Force.
entries.remove_forceresiststates: Your heightened resistance to state attacks fades.
entries.remove_forceresistbleeding: Your heightened resistance to bleeding fades.
entries.remove_forceresistpoison: Your heightened resistance to poison fades.
entries.remove_forceresistdisease: Your heightened resistance to disease fades.
entries.remove_forceabsorb2: Your sensitivity to Force power fades.
entries.remove_forceabsorb1: Your sensitivity to Force power fades.
entries.remove_forcearmor2: Your solid barrier of Force fades.
entries.remove_forcearmor1: Your solid barrier of Force fades.
entries.apply_avoidincapacitation: You use the Force to push your body on regardless of injuries.
entries.apply_forceresiststates: Your body's natural resistance to state-afflicting attacks is enhanced by the Force.
entries.apply_forceresistbleeding: Your body's natural resistance to bleeding is enhanced by the Force.
entries.apply_forceresistpoison: Your body's natural resistance to poison is enhanced by the Force.
entries.apply_forceresistdisease: Your body's natural resistance to disease is enhanced by the Force.
entries.apply_forceabsorb2: You make yourself more sensitive to the use of Force power around you.
entries.apply_forceabsorb1: You make yourself more sensitive to the use of Force power around you.
entries.apply_forcefeedback2: You use the Force to create a reflective barrier around you.
entries.apply_forcefeedback1: You use the Force to create a reflective barrier around you.
entries.apply_forceshield2: A protective shield of the Force envelops you.
entries.apply_forceshield1: A protective shield of the Force envelops you.
entries.apply_forcearmor2: A solid barrier of the Force forms around you.
entries.apply_forcearmor1: A solid barrier of the Force forms around you.
entries.apply_forcespeed2: You begin to move with an unnatural speed.
entries.apply_forcespeed1: You begin to move with an unnatural speed.
entries.force_buff_present: You already have a similar Force enhancement active.
entries.force_resist_states_d: Your body's natural protections against state-afflicting attacks are bolstered by the Force.
entries.force_resist_bleeding_d: Your body's natural protections against bleeding are bolstered by the Force.
entries.force_resist_poison_d: Your body's natural protections against poisons are bolstered by the Force.
entries.force_resist_disease_d: Your body's natural protections against disease are bolstered by the Force.
entries.force_absorb_d: You are able to absorb some of the Force power from harmful Force attacks.
entries.force_feedback_d: You are surrounded by a reflective Force barrier that will cause damage to anyone who attacks you with the Force.
entries.force_shield_d: Your barrier protects you against damaging effects of the Force.
entries.force_armor_d: You are encased in a semi-solid barrier of the Force.
entries.force_speed_d: Your actions are sped up to unnatural speeds from the Force.
entries.lightsaber_no_color: That lightsaber can not be used until it has a color-modifying Force crystal installed.
entries.confirm_tune_prompt:
Once this crystal has been tuned you will be the only Jedi that can use it.

Are you sure you want to tune this crystal?
entries.jedi_death_skill_loss: You have lost %TO due to death.
entries.holocron_quiet: The Holocron is quiet.  The ancients' knowledge of the Force will no longer assist you on your journey.  You must continue seeking on your own.
entries.welcome_body:
You are about to take your first steps in one of the ultimate journeys in Star Wars Galaxies.

It is a very precarious time for users of the Force and your path to become a Jedi Knight is wrought with danger and excitement.

Before you begin there are a few important things to note.  Jedi must train secretly and locating your personal trainer can sometimes be difficult.  Use the command /findmytrainer to sense the location of your trainer.  At times you may not be able to detect your trainer, if this happens wait a little while and try later.

The dedication required to learn your Force abilities will take all of your personal resources.  You will have to surrender non Jedi skills in order to advance along the path to Jedi Knighthood.

Finally, the life of a Jedi is wrought with extreme risk.  Act carefully as your actions could bring great and devastating repercussions.  Jedi are extremely susceptible to the rigors of cloning.  When a Jedi dies they will suffer an experience loss.  

On behalf of the entire development team, thank you and continue enjoying your time in Star Wars Galaxies. May the Force be with you.
entries.unable_to_locate_trainer: You are unable to sense your trainer at this time.
entries.no_surrender_skill: You are not allowed to surrender Jedi Skills.
entries.not_your_trainer: I can not help you further down your chosen path. Seek out a new skill trainer.
entries.trainer_updated: Seek out your new trainer. (New Waypoint Received)
entries.not_this_target: This command cannot be used on this target.
entries.stop_states_other: You cure all negative states on %TT.
entries.staunch_bleeding_other: %TT looks like their bleeding has decreaed.
entries.animal_attack_fail: You fail to enrage your target.
entries.animal_scare_fail: You fail to scare your target.
entries.mind_trick_fail: You fail to trick your target.
entries.mind_trick_success: You successfully use your Force power to trick your target.
entries.fail_calm_target: You fail to calm your target.
entries.calm_target: You successfully calm down your target.
entries.jedi_recruiter_response: There's something about you I don't like. I'm not going to talk to you.
entries.permadead_notify: You are dead. You have used up all of your deaths and must begin your journey again.  When you clone you will lose all skills, credits and items.
entries.not_your_lightsaber: You cannot use a lightsaber that was crafted by someone else.
entries.no_equip_lightsaber: You are not able to equip this item.
entries.no_force_power: You do not have sufficient Force power to perform that action.
entries.force_sensitive: You begin to feel attuned with the power of the Force. Your Force Sensitive abilities will be unlocked after Publish 10.
entries.waypoint_created_to_trainer: A waypoint to your trainer has been placed in your datapad.
entries.jedi_death_decay: One of your Jedi deaths has decayed. You now have %DI tracked deaths.
entries.no_help_target: You are not permitted to help that target.
entries.heal_self: You heal yourself for %DI points of %TO.
entries.heal_other_other: You are healed for %DI points of %TO by %TT.
entries.no_damage_heal_other: Your target has no damage of that type to heal.
entries.no_damage_heal_self: You have no damage of that type.
